price: (Kun) qananii muraasa, Ergasii teesson isaanii jahannami, Afatichi waa hammaatee!
arabic: مَتَٰعٞ قَلِيلٞ ثُمَّ مَأۡوَىٰهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمِهَادُ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: matāʿun qalīlun thumma mawāhum jahannamu wabi'sa al-mihādu
